title: Course of Action Analysis for Noncombatant Evacuation (NEO)
description: A planner must compare COAs for evacuating citizens from a country with a deteriorating security situation: using military aircraft vs. chartering civilian aircraft.

tasks.description: Develop plans for both the military and civilian air evacuation COAs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates two distinct and viable evacuation plans.

tasks.description: Assess the risks for each COA, considering the threat to the aircraft and the political sensitivity of using military assets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately assesses that military aircraft are safer but more provocative.

tasks.description: Recommend the civilian charter COA as long as the airport remains secure, as it is less likely to cause a diplomatic incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner makes a well-reasoned recommendation based on the political context.
